TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnmanagedMemoryAccessor extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 從 Managed 程式碼對 Unmanaged 記憶體區塊提供隨機存取。

span.span: Provides random access to unmanaged blocks of memory from managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法物件傳回 unmanaged 的記憶體對應檔的檢視所使用的記憶體區塊。The method of a object returns the unmanaged blocks of memory for working with views of memory-mapped files. [!INCLUDE[note_unnecessary_dispose](~/includes/note-unnecessary-dispose.md)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

span.span: Reads a structure of type from the accessor into a provided reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來讀取的中型到大型的結構，不會輕易地容納的這個類別中的其他讀取方法。Use this method to read medium to large structures that are not easily accommodated by the other read methods in this class.

span.span: There are not enough bytes after to read in a structure of type .
-or-

span.span: is a value type that contains one or more reference types.

exception.span: 小於零或大於這個存取子的容量。

The accessor does not support reading.
The accessor has been disposed.

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法來撰寫不會輕易地容納其他的中型到大型結構此類別中的方法。Use this method to write medium to large structures that are not easily accommodated by the other methods in this class.

exception.span: 在 之後，存取子中沒有足夠的位元組可以寫入型別 的結構。

span.span: There are not enough bytes in the accessor after to write a structure of type .

exception.span: 小於零或大於這個存取子的容量。

span.span: is less than zero or greater than the capacity of the accessor.
The accessor does not support writing.
The accessor has been disposed.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
